html:
The Canon EOS R5 Mark II received its first instant rebate in the USA, bringing the price down to $3999 (Reg $4299) for the foreseeable future. Adorama has taken it a step further and provided an addition $500 in value by adding official goodies from Canon, SanDisk and Capture One.

Both the Body only and kit with the RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM is included in this offer.

  • Canon EOS R5 Mark II Body
  • Canon LP-E6P Battery
  • Canon EF-EOS R Adapter
  • SanDisk 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card
  • Capture One Pro Prepaid Subscription

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS R5 Mark II Bundle $3999 Body / $5099 Kit

Canon EOS R5 Mark II Overview

  • Advanced 45MP back-illuminated and stacked sensor for high-speed image capture
  • Innovative DIGIC Accelerator chip for enhanced processing and performance
  • Enhanced autofocus with subject tracking and Eye Control AF for precise focus
  • Action priority mode for capturing fast-paced sports action
  • 8K video recording capability with Cinema EOS terminology for professional videography
  • Improved 5-axis in-body image stabilization for sharp, clear images
  • Dust- and weather-resistant construction for durability in all conditions
  • Dual card slots for CFexpress and UHS-II SD Memory Cards for ample storage

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS R5 Mark II Bundle $3999 Body / $5099 Kit
